item.description:
Be a part of Steppin' history you must arrive before 8pm and be on the floor steppin at 8pm.

Guests that arrive by 7:59pm are eligible to participate in a special raffle for some great gifts.


"Boston Will Be Celebrating The Dance And The People Who Dance With Steppers Across the Country in Unity"



When: Saturday, August 14, 2010
Time: 7:30pm - 12 midnight
Cover: $10 ATD - Featuring DJ Bruce
To purchase ticket on advance for the event see Barbara or Steve

Attire: Steppin -n- Jean


"Help us celebrate the dance and the people who dance the dance.
It's a great excuse to get your step on and best of all you won't need to travel (unless you want to)!"
(source M.B)


Click on link to find out more information http://www.steppers4e...

group.name: The Original Steppers of Boston Inc. 2006

item.name: Coming to Boston - National Chicago Style Steppers Day - 8/14/10
